Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at Racine/67th
ShortDescription: 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 63rd, Loomis, Marquette, and Racine due to, police activity near Racine/67th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 63rd, Loomis, Marquette, and Racine due to, police activity near Racine/67th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier track condition near Merchandise Mart. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier track condition near Merchandise Mart.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
